00037 /// writes data samples from a single rectangular region 
00038 class RegionTIC : public MSDataAnalyzer
00039 {
00040     public:
00041 
00042     struct Config
00043     {
00044         std::pair<double,double> mzRange;
00045         Config(const std::string& args); 
00046     };
00047 
00048     RegionTIC(const MSDataCache& cache, const Config& config);
00049 
00050     /// \name MSDataAnalyzer interface
00051     //@{
00052     virtual void open(const DataInfo& dataInfo);
00053 
00054     virtual UpdateRequest updateRequested(const DataInfo& dataInfo,
00055                                           const SpectrumIdentity& spectrumIdentity) const;
00056 
00057     virtual void update(const DataInfo& dataInfo, 
00058                         const Spectrum& spectrum);
00059 
00060     virtual void close(const DataInfo& dataInfo);
00061     //@}
00062 
00063     private:
00064     const MSDataCache& cache_;
00065     boost::shared_ptr<RegionAnalyzer> regionAnalyzer_;
00066     Config config_;
00067 };

00070 template<>
00071 struct analyzer_strings<RegionTIC>
00072 {
00073     static const char* id() {return "tic";}

00075     static const char* argsFormat() {return "[mzLow [mzHigh]]";}
